duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform ultrasonic inspections using contact, immersion, and phased array ultrasonic methods.
Interpret inspection results and apply acceptance criteria identified on drawing or shop work order.
Interface/communicate with employees to describe inspection results.
Perform ultrasonic thickness measurements of composite materials and metallics.
Perform ultrasonic inspections of weldments of various types, such as friction-stir, laser, electron beam, GMAW, etc.
Perform all necessary daily, weekly, and monthly process control checks.

education_certification.credential: Ultrasonic (UT) certified. Needs to have ASNT or NAS 410 certification.
US citizen or national, US permanent resident (current Green Card holder), or lawfully admitted into the US as a refugee or granted asylum.
